panels.description: Map of where circuit $circuit is operating

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
data ->> 'Name' as building,
data ->'PowerInfo' ->> 'CircuitGroupID' as circuit,
data ->> 'Recipe' as recipe,
(data -> 'location' ->> 'x')::NUMERIC/100 as x,
(data -> 'location' ->> 'y')::NUMERIC/100 as y,
(data -> 'location' ->> 'z')::NUMERIC/100 as z,
(((data -> 'location' ->> 'x')::NUMERIC + 375000) * 0.0000001015) as longitude,
(((data -> 'location' ->> 'y')::NUMERIC + 375000) * -0.0000001172) as latitude
from cache where metric in ('factory', 'extractor')
and (data -> 'PowerInfo' ->> 'CircuitGroupID')::numeric = $circuit
and url = '$server'
and session_name = '$session'

panels.title: Circuit $circuit map

panels.description: number of buildings on each circuit

targets.rawSql:
select 
data -> 'PowerInfo' ->> 'CircuitGroupID' as circuit,
count(*) as building_count
from cache where metric in ('factory', 'extractor')
and url = '$server'
and session_name = '$session'
group by circuit
order by building_count

panels.title: Circuit and building counts
